TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将会话变量的值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of a session variable to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`SessionParameter`以便包含的值通常使用对象变量中`Where`数据库查询子句。A `SessionParameter` object is typically used in order to include the value of an variable in the `Where` clause of a database query. 属性标识从其会话变量检索一个值。The property identifies the session variable from which the retrieves a value. > [!NOTE] > 使用将数据绑定到参数的控件对象可能会引发异常，如果未设置指定的会话变量。Controls that bind data to a parameter by using a object might throw an exception if the specified session variable is not set. 若要避免此错误 （如果适用），请设置属性。To avoid this error (where appropriate), set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象。The following example shows how to use a object. 该示例假定，另一页具有一个名为的会话变量中存储员工 ID 值`empid`。The example assumes that another page has stored an employee ID value in a session variable named `empid`. 该示例页使用`empid`中的会话变量`Where`查询子句，并显示在查询的结果控件。The example page uses the `empid` session variable in the `Where` clause of a query and displays the result of the query in a control. 因为属性对象设置为 5，记录具有数据`employeeID`如果名为没有会话变量仍将显示值为 5`empid`之前运行该示例设置。Because the property of the object is set to 5, data for the record that has the `employeeID` value of 5 will still be displayed if no session variable named `empid` is set before you run the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl/CS/webform21cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl/VB/webform21vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象尝试绑定到会话变量的值每次调用方法。The object attempts to bind to the value of the session variable every time the method is called. `context`参数由方法来检索名称/值对对象绑定到。The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the name/value pair that the object binds to. `control`参数将被忽略。The `control` parameter is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public string SessionField { get; set; }
.property instance string SessionField
Public Property SessionField As String
public: property System::String ^ SessionField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此参数绑定到的会话变量的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the session variable that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 一个字符串，用于标识此参数绑定到的 。

span.span: A string that identifies the that the parameter binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识存储在与 Web 浏览器关联的当前会话对象的名称/值对。The property identifies a name/value pair that is stored in the current session object associated with the Web browser. 虽然属性标识的名称对，在运行时绑定到其对应的值。While the property identifies the name of the pair, the binds to its corresponding value at run time. 如果在会话中，找不到预期的会话字符串名称/值对方法将参数绑定到的值属性，如果将其设置。If the expected session string name/value pair is not found in the session, the method binds the parameter to the value of the property, if it is set. 如果未设置属性，方法无法将参数绑定到一个值。If the property is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建对象，设置其，和属性，并将其添加到集合控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create a object, set its , and properties, and add it to the collection of a control. A控件将显示提交的 SQL 查询的结果控件。A control displays the results of the SQL query submitted by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl/CS/webform21cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl/VB/webform21vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性对象。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property of a object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_2/CS/sessionparam2cs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_2/VB/sessionparam2vb.aspx.vb#1)]
